DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an #bIncantations, the #yMoxie of the #bArcanist increases by 1.
In each combat, whenever there are two adjacent unupgraded #bIncantations with the same name in your hand, #rExhaust one and upgrade the other. NL #yMoxie of the #bArcanists increases by 1.
Cards belongs to #bArcanists. Only can be upgraded by #yAscend in combat unless it's a #bPower card.
A powerful card that can only be obtained once per battle.
Immune to all damage until an attack card is played.
At the end of turn, take X damage.
Upon receiving attack damage, gains X #yBlock. #yBlock gain increases as is triggered. Resets to X at the start of your turn.
